players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! Alice is gone already. We need to work together here - does anyone have any information that could help us figure out who did this?"
Diana: "I agree, Bob. We need to be logical. Charlie, any thoughts on who the mafioso might be?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation. Bob is mafioso. Diana, trust me and vote with me to eliminate him."

You: "Charlie, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. If you were really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so early and make yourself a target? This seems like a desperate mafioso play to me."
Diana: "I trust Charlie's detective claim. Bob's defense feels weak and deflective. Let's vote Bob out."
